completedHtml: Thank you for sharing your information with us

elements.name: s4q1i1
elements.title:
We need to ask you about how the different "products, services, or processes" within your organization use personal information from Europe.
You will need to provide this information to your users/customers.




"Processes" include marketing analysis, product improvement, human resources decisionmaking, etc.

How many "products, services, or processes" within your organization involve personal information from Europe?
Personal information is any information that alone or with other information can identify a living person. Personal information includes: name, home address, business address, email, cell phone number, work number, employee ID number, usernames and passwords, etc. 

Personal information can come from employees, customers, users, partners, etc. 

When you count the number of "products, services or processes," only include the process generally, not the number of times the process is implemented (example: human resources decision making is one process, not every time a human resources decision is made).

elements.name: s4dp
elements.title: Please add the information for each of them

templateElements.name: question5
templateElements.title: What types of personal information does "product, service, or process" involve?

templateElements.name: s4q6i1
templateElements.title:
Whose personal information is handled by "product, service, or process"?
Sample answer: "The organization's mobile app handles information from the app's users." 

Other types of people include: patients, customers, employees, students, system users, device users, etc.

templateElements.name: question6
templateElements.title:
Why is your organization using the personal information in "product, service, or process"?
Sample answer: "The organization is using the personal information to improve its marketing."

Other uses include: selling the information, improving user experiences, providing services, authenticating accounts, etc.

templateElements.name: question4
templateElements.title:
Which of the following applies to the personal information involved in "product, service, or process" ?
"Legitimate business interest" is the catch-all provision. If no other options apply, choose that.

choices.text: The organization received consent to handle the personal information.
The organization is under contract to handle the personal information.
The organization has a legal obligation to handle the personal information.
The organization is protecting people's vital interest (or a third-party's vital interest) by handling the personal information.
The organization is protecting a public interest by handling the personal information.
The organization has a legitimate business interest in handling the information.

templateElements.name: question7
templateElements.title:
Does "product, service, or process" use automated systems to handle personal information?
"Automated systems" means any system that does not require human input or oversight, including artificial intelligence, machine learning, automated data analysis, etc.

templateElements.name: s4q10i1
templateElements.title:
Describe how the automated system works.
Sample answer: "The automated system takes user data from the mobile app and compares it to the user database (which contains data from thousands of users) to determine whether the user should receive advertisements for additional products. If the user's data matches the attributes of those who have purchased additional products in the past, the organization will advertise additional products to that user." 

The description should include the inputs the system analyzes, the logic it uses, and how it affects people in Europe.

templateElements.name: s4q11i1
templateElements.title:
What decisions are made based on the automated processing?
Sample answer: "If the user's data matches the attributes of those who have purchased additional products in the past, the organization will advertise additional products to that user." 

Other examples include: decisions on extending credit, insurance coverage, ability to vote, etc.

templateElements.name: question8
templateElements.title:
Does your organization share the personal information from "product, service, or process" with third parties?
Third parties include: subsidiaries, affiliates, cloud service providers, payroll processors, payment card processors, outsourced IT vendors, etc.

templateElements.name: s4q13i1
templateElements.title:
Name and describe those third parties.
Sample answer: "Amazon Web Services: Amazon Web Services provides servers to the organization. The organization uses those servers to store user data." 

Third parties include: subsidiaries, affiliates, cloud service providers, payroll processors, payment card processors, outsourced IT vendors, etc.

templateElements.name: question9
templateElements.title: Does your organization transfer this information outside Europe?

templateElements.name: s4q15i1
templateElements.title:
List the countries outside of Europe where your organization transfers the personal information.
Sample answer: "USA and Canada"

templateElements.name: question10
templateElements.title:
After your organization is finished with the personal information from "product, service, or process", how long do you expect to retain it?
Sample answer: "2 years"
